"@Zak_Inc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548c75e36368720c20a10300#post_548c75e36368720c20a10300
[bq="Zak_Inc"]So, uh, what games other than Halo do you lot play?

I play a lot of Terraria, CS:GO and The Binding of Isaac Rebirth.[/bq]
League of legends.

My still to play list consists of:
Devil May Cry 4
Persona 3
Persona 4
Okami
Stalker Call of Pipryat

I know, I know "but you like those games, why haven't you finished them yet?".  Well short version is that pcsx2 for linux used to be utter crap, but now they've fixed the problem with how it only a very select number of graphics cards, I just got devil may cry 4 and I just finished shadow of chernobyl.  I'm playing devil may cry 4 then pipryat then okami and then persona 3 & 4.
